show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Ferguson Riots Deconstructed
content:
We see how the streets of America can easily descend into chaos. Is this the coming “new normal”? Beware the immense pent-up anger in the country due to decades of social decay.
Needless to say, these situations in America are accompanied by panicked overreaction on the part of the police.
A study of SWAT action.
It’s ugly.
More on the militarization of the police.
More grim news on real estate.
The horrendous consequences of NAFTA.
The deteriorating economic situation in Europe.
The heightened IPO mania heralds a market top.
Asset bubbles invariably lead to systemic poverty.
